channel.title: Thingy: A Things Parser for Drafts 5
channel.description: I wrote a task parser for Drafts 5. Source and documentation are available on [Github](https://github.com/dansays/thingy), and the action group is up on the [Action Directory](https://actions.getdrafts.com/g/1HW). Features include emoji-based property attribution, and an autotagger that applies tags and other properties based on title patterns.

item.title: Thingy: A Things Parser for Drafts 5
item.dc:creator: theshadowknows
item.description:
This is seriously the coolest and most useful action I’ve used with Drafts. Thank you for writing it. The ability to automatically tag items using regular expressions is fantastic! I kind of see like it like my own personal narrow AI for action items.

Read full topic
item.source: Thingy: A Things Parser for Drafts 5

item.description:
thank-you!
between drafts-things-fantadtixal I finally have the schedule-diary-system I’ve been fightingly pit together for a waitress century…your parser his been a big help.
